page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: THIS 12SQ.KM. LIES TO THE SOUTH OF EDINBURGH. IT IS A RURAL AREA WITH A VARIED AND INTERESTING LANDSCAPE. WITHIN THE AREA ARE THREE VILLAGES, THE LARGEST OF WHICH IS PATHHEAD THEREFORE WE HAVE CHOSEN TO GO INTO LIFE IN PATHHEAD IN MUCH MORE DETAIL THAN THE OTHERS. THE OTHER VILLAGES ARE EDGEHEAD AND DEWARTON. THE AREA ALSO HAS A NATIONAL PARK WHICH ATTRACTS A LOT OF PEOPLE TO THE AREA. THERE ARE ALSO TO LARGE HOUSES; OXENFOORD CASTLE, WHICH IS NOW A PRIVATE GIRLS BOARDING SCHOOL AND PRESTON HALL WHICH IS THE SEAT OF THE CALLANDER FAMILY. IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO COVER EVERYTHING IN THIS SHORT PIECE BUT WE HAVE TRIED TO COVER SOME THINGS WHICH WE THINK OTHERS MAY FIND INTERSTING.
